community_tooltip_leave_to_create: You must leave the current congregation to create a new one.
community_tooltip_leave_to_join: You must leave the current congregation to join a new one.
create_congregation_desc: Create a private space for your community.
feature_bible_reader_desc: Read and study the Holy Scripture in multiple versions.
feature_characters_desc: Explore the stories and lessons of biblical figures.
feature_chat_desc: Ask questions and get biblically-informed answers.
feature_community_desc: Connect and share with your local church.
feature_feeling_journey_desc: A guided journey to process your emotions in the light of the Bible.
feature_hope_bridge_desc: Create an encrypted message of hope to share.
feature_journal_desc: Record your reflections and prayers in a safe space.
feature_study_plans_desc: Create personalized study plans based on your questions.
home_welcome_subtitle: Ready to strengthen your faith journey today?
join_congregation_desc: Enter an invite code to join an existing congregation.
